title: Location
description: A location, optionally with accompanying geographic coordinate data
$comment: This is a top-level database object

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of object. Must be set to `Location`.

id.title: ID
id.description: A unique database identifier for this Location

access.title: Access Rights
access.description: Since locations sometimes contain personal information like addresses, it is important to consider the proper access management policy for them.

address.title: Address
address.description: An address associated with this location

bibliography.title: Bibliography
bibliography.description: A collection of citations to bibliographic sources about this location

items.title: Citation
items.description: A citation to a bibliographic source about this location

date.title: Date
date.description: The date and optionally time that a language was spoken in this location

dateCreated.title: Date Created
dateCreated.description: The date and optionally time that this Location object was created

dateModified.title: Date Modified
dateModified.description: The date and optionally time that this Location was last modified

geoJSON.title: GeoJSON Geometry Object
geoJSON.description: A GeoJSON object describing this Location. Must adhere to the GeoJSON format: https://geojson.org/.

link.title: Link
link.description: A URL where a presentational format for this resource may be viewed

name.title: Name
name.description: A name for this location, e.g. `Susanâ€™s House` or `Valley High School`, or `Shenandoah River`, optionally in multiple languages. The name must be provided in at least one language.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: A collection of notes about this Location

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: A set of tags for this Location

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL where information about this location can be retrieved

note.eng: There are no restrictions on access to this location.

notes.text: Built on the site of the Chitimacha village Kas Kec Namu.
